short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your journey towards a life free of nicotine

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take the first step towards a healthier life with Zerotine, your personalized dashboard designed to help you quit nicotine for good. Currently in early development, Zerotine offers essential tracking features that empower you to stay motivated on your journey to freedom, with more features coming soon!

Features:

Days Quit Tracker: Easily monitor how long you've been nicotine-free, celebrating your milestones along the way.

Money Saved Tracker: See how much money you’ve saved by quitting, motivating you to continue on your path to freedom.

Products Avoided Tracker: Keep a record of the nicotine products you've successfully avoided, reinforcing your commitment.

User-Friendly Design: Enjoy a clean, easy-to-navigate interface that puts your progress front and center.

Zerotine is just the beginning—stay tuned for upcoming features designed to enhance your quit journey and support your success. Join a community of like-minded individuals committed to quitting nicotine and reclaiming their lives. Install Zerotine today and take control of your health!
